  • Class
    Description
    Assistant
    Class Assistant represents a playing card.
    Hand
    Class Hand contains a set of all the Player's available Assistant cards which have a matching back
    Mage
    All Mages types that Players can choose
    Player
    Player class represents the Player and contains all the information about him: his nickname, the magical school board he received in the beginning of the game, the color for the towers that he will build, his Assistant cards and in particular the last one he played, the amount of coins he owns etc.
    PlayerInterface
    This interface exposes the method needed to check if the Player is active
    PlayerTest
    Class PlayerTest tests Player class.
    SchoolBoard
    SchoolBoard represents the magical school board received by each player before the start of the game.
